item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-11
item.description: MoviePass is officially coming back (4 minute read) MoviePass co-founder Stacy Spikes has announced that the service will return this summer.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-21
item.description: Googleâ€™s foldable phone plans include two devices, Android 12.1 release (4 minute read) Google is rumored to be working on two foldable phones and incorporating foldable functionality into an out-of-cycle update to Android.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-12
item.description: Netflix Begins Test to Crack Down on Password Sharing Outside Your Household (2 minute read) Some Netflix TV users have started seeing a notification prompting them to get their own accounts if they don’t live with the owner of the account.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-09
item.description: Tesla buys $1.5 billion in bitcoin, plans to accept it as payment (2 minute read) Tesla announced that it bought $1.
